alert.note: Alert for Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 11:59AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gray County through 1230 PM CDT... At 1158 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Lake Mcclellan, or 13 miles south of Pampa, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lefors. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
